cast.overview: Lorelei Lee is a beautiful showgirl engaged to be married to the wealthy Gus Esmond, much to the disapproval of Gus' rich father, Esmond Sr., who thinks that Lorelei is just after his money. When Lorelei goes on a cruise accompanied only by her best friend, Dorothy Shaw, Esmond Sr. hires Ernie Malone, a private detective, to follow her and report any questionable behavior that would disqualify her from the marriage.
cast.title: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes

cast.original_title: The Man Who Knew Too Much
cast.overview: A couple vacationing in Morocco with their young son accidentally stumble upon an assassination plot. When the child is kidnapped to ensure their silence, they have to take matters into their own hands to save him.
cast.title: The Man Who Knew Too Much

cast.overview: Jerry Mulligan is an exuberant American expatriate in Paris trying to make a reputation as a painter. His friend Adam is a struggling concert pianist who's a long time associate of a famous French singer, Henri Baurel. A lonely society woman, Milo Roberts, takes Jerry under her wing and supports him, but is interested in more than his art.
cast.title: An American in Paris

details.biography: Peter Camlin was born on September 5, 1902 in Enghien, France. He was an actor, known for Thriller (1960), Alfred Hitchcock Presents (1955) and Combat! (1962). He died on December 17, 1985 in Los Angeles, California, USA.
details.name: Peter Camlin
